welcome.title: Welcome to Eurekia!
welcome.subtitle: Your personal AI assistant for building amazing habits
welcome.description: We're here to help you build the habits that will transform your life. Let's make this epic!

avatar.title: Choose Your Hero Avatar
avatar.subtitle: Select your heroic identity!
avatar.description: Your avatar will represent you on your habit-forming journey. Choose the one that resonates most with you!

mission.title: Define Your Hero Mission
mission.subtitle: What's your superpower and your nemesis?
mission.skill: Your Superpower (Skill you want to develop)
mission.weakness: Your Nemesis (Weakness you want to overcome)
mission.weaknessPlaceholder: e.g. Procrastination, stress, bad eating habits...

onboarding.completingSubtitle: Just a moment while we prepare everything for you! 🚀

dashboard.subtitle: Ready to level up your life?
dashboard.questDescription: Level up by completing daily quests and building epic habits!
dashboard.questsDescription: Complete quests to earn XP and level up!
dashboard.noQuestsDescription: Ready to start your first quest and become a habit hero?

habits.title: 🎯 My Habit Quests
habits.subtitle: Build your habit empire, one quest at a time
habits.noHabitsDescription: Ready to start your epic habit journey?

mission.title: 🎯 My Hero Mission
mission.subtitle: Define your heroic identity and conquer your challenges
mission.emptyDescription: Every hero needs a clear mission. Define your superpower and nemesis to begin your epic transformation.

mood.title: 😊 Mood Tracking
mood.subtitle: Track your emotional wellbeing day by day
mood.noHistoryDescription: Start logging your daily mood to see patterns and celebrate your emotional growth.

reports.title: 📊 AI Reports
reports.subtitle: Intelligent insights about your progress
reports.noReportsDescription: Generate intelligent reports to get personalized insights about your habit progress.
